name: Abstract Aerial Art by Dipanjan Pal

metadata.name: Frozen
metadata.description:
Far away in the remote corners of the Indian Himalayas lies a valley named Spiti. The name originates from a river that flows through and brings life to the entire valley. It gets extremely cold in winter, with temperatures dipping to -25C for weeks before slowly returning to normal. 

I was fortunate enough to visit the place at a time when Winter has just set in. Fresh snow adorned the entire valley, and the river was just beginning to freeze. The entire place looked like a fairytale with the river being half frozen, and the turquoise water flowing through the sheets of ice.
